thread.section_title: The Roger - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Will stay here again
thread.title_full: Will stay here again - Review of The Roger, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah M
title: Will stay here again
text: In NYC for business, this centrally located hotel has everything you need to be comfortable while you are in town. I stayed on the 12th floor and it was very quiet, I didn't hear any street noise. The other guests could be heard occasionally but generally quieted down after a moment. I would stay at the hotel again.
